item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

13. ACTORS: A Model of Concurrent Computation in Distributed Systems (7 points | 1 comment)
14. OpenAI quietly funded independent math benchmark before setting record with o3 (75 points | 23 comments)

21. Refinement types for input validation (4 points | 5 comments)

23. Comparing 13 Rust Crates for Extracting Text from HTML (1 points | no comments)
24. Reminiscing on my early days writing software (2023) (10 points | no comments)
25. Prototyping an Automatic Tattoo Gun (2 points | no comments)
